DOC.brief_summary: Investigators intend conduct prospective randomize trial compare vaginal hysterectomy uterosacral colposuspension laparoscopic supracervical hysterectomy sacrocervicopexy . Both surgery minimally-invasive surgical standard care uterine prolapse repair . Nobody know one procedure superior , compare directly . The investigator hypothesize difference objective , subjective , cost-effectiveness two procedure two year surgery .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Laparoscopic Vaginal Surgical Repair Uterine Prolapse
DOC.criteria: Patients primary symptomatic uterine prolapse ≥ 18 year age Considering pelvic reconstructive surgery Unwillingness randomize one two surgical approach Pregnant plan maintain future fertility Unable general anesthesia Currently undergo chemotherapy OR current history pelvic radiation Previous adverse reaction synthetic mesh Recent history abnormal pap ( past 10 year ) Cervical uterine cancer Previous hysterectomy Previous central vault uterine prolapse repair Uterus ≥ 14 week size Uterine cancer History significant pelvic adhesive disease Elongated cervix ( length D C > 6cm ) Fibroid ≥ 7cm Post menopausal enlarge uterus
